ValidationRule.description: 2 Most Recent 5500s must be verified before Conversion Implementation = Completed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (ISPICKVAL( Implementation_Status__c , "Completed")) && ISPICKVAL( Plan_Type__c , "Conversion Plan" ) && ISCHANGED( Implementation_Status__c ) && ISBLANK(Text( X2_Most_Recent_5500s__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please verify 2 most recent 5500s as "Yes" or "N/A"
